details.prompt: wearing a Hanfu inspired by the elegance of lotus flowers, soft green and pink hues, standing on a wooden bridge over a lotus pond, full body shot, one hand lightly brushing the petals of a lotus flower, her other hand lifting her skirt slightly, a gentle smile on her face, soft sunlight reflecting on the water
